price: Isaaniif ishee keessa faayidaaleefii dhugaatiiwwantu jira. Sila (Rabbiin) hin galateeffattanuu?
arabic: وَلَهُمۡ فِيهَا مَنَٰفِعُ وَمَشَارِبُۚ أَفَلَا يَشۡكُرُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: walahum fīhā manāfiʿu wamashāribu afalā yashkurūna
